persistent.desc: Avoid Popup closing by hitting ESC key or by clicking/tapping outside of the Popup

validate.desc: Validates model then triggers 'save' and closes Popup; Returns a Boolean ('true' means valid, 'false' means abort); Syntax: validate(value)

returns.desc: Is the model valid or not?

default.desc: Used for injecting the form component

title.desc: Slot for custom title (overrides 'title' prop when used)

input.desc: Emitted when Popup gets cancelled in order to reset model to its initial value; Is also used by v-model

show.desc: Emitted right after Popup gets shown

hide.desc: Emitted right after Popup gets dismissed

save.desc: Emitted when value has been successfully validated and it should be saved

cancel.desc: Emitted when user cancelled the change (hit ESC key or clicking outside of Popup or hit 'Cancel' button)

set.desc: Trigger a model update; Validates model (and emits 'save' event if it's the case) then closes Popup

cancel.desc: Triggers a model reset to its initial value ('cancel' event is emitted) then closes Popup
